net.myorb.gral

Class ChartLibSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.charting.DisplayGraphSegmentTools
      • net.myorb.gral.GralPrimitives
        • net.myorb.gral.ChartLibSupport

  • public class ChartLibSupport
extends GralPrimitives
    support for an implementation of the chart library using GRAL

    Michael Druckman

        build chart component
        Parameters:
        funcPlots - the collection of plot points
        title - a title for the chart being built
        expressions - the text of expressions being charted
        domainLabel - a label for X axis
        rangeLabel - a label for Y axis

        the chart component
